select date_format(meeting_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as date, meeting_title as info from sys_property_meeting
community_id = #{communityId}

SELECT m.meeting_id, m.meeting_title, c.community_name, m.meeting_time, m.meeting_location, m.vote_start_time, m.vote_end_time, total_stats.total_owners, total_stats.total_area, COALESCE(participated_stats.participated_owners, 0) as participated_owners, COALESCE(participated_stats.participated_area, 0) as participated_area, CASE WHEN total_stats.total_owners > 0 THEN ROUND(COALESCE(participated_stats.participated_owners, 0) * 100.0 / total_stats.total_owners, 2) ELSE 0 END as owner_participation_rate, CASE WHEN total_stats.total_area > 0 THEN ROUND(COALESCE(participated_stats.participated_area, 0) * 100.0 / total_stats.total_area, 2) ELSE 0 END as area_participation_rate FROM sys_property_meeting m LEFT JOIN sys_estate_community c ON m.community_id = c.community_id CROSS JOIN ( SELECT (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT eup.user_id) FROM sys_estate_user_property eup INNER JOIN sys_estate_property ep ON eup.property_id = ep.property_id WHERE eup.community_id = #{communityId} AND eup.status = '1' AND (eup.del_flag = '0' OR eup.del_flag IS NULL) AND (ep.del_flag = '0' OR ep.del_flag IS NULL) ) as total_owners, (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(area), 0) FROM sys_estate_property WHERE community_id = #{communityId} AND (del_flag = '0' OR del_flag IS NULL) ) as total_area ) total_stats LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT sub_voted_users.user_id) as participated_owners, COALESCE(SUM(ep.area), 0) as participated_area FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM sys_meeting_vote WHERE meeting_id = #{meetingId} AND vote_option IS NOT NULL ) sub_voted_users INNER JOIN sys_estate_user_property eup ON sub_voted_users.user_id = eup.user_id INNER JOIN sys_estate_property ep ON eup.property_id = ep.property_id WHERE eup.community_id = #{communityId} AND eup.status = '1' AND (eup.del_flag = '0' OR eup.del_flag IS NULL) AND (ep.del_flag = '0' OR ep.del_flag IS NULL) ) participated_stats ON 1=1 WHERE m.meeting_id = #{meetingId}

SELECT ep.building_name as buildingName, ep.unit_name as unitName, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN eup.status = '1' THEN eup.user_id END) as totalHouseholds, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN mv.user_id IS NOT NULL THEN mv.user_id END) as votedHouseholds FROM sys_estate_property ep LEFT JOIN sys_estate_user_property eup ON ep.property_id = eup.property_id AND eup.community_id = #{communityId} AND eup.status = '1' AND (eup.del_flag = '0' OR eup.del_flag IS NULL) LEFT JOIN sys_meeting_vote mv ON eup.user_id = mv.user_id AND mv.meeting_id = #{meetingId} AND mv.vote_option IS NOT NULL WHERE ep.community_id = #{communityId} AND (ep.del_flag = '0' OR ep.del_flag IS NULL) GROUP BY ep.building_name, ep.unit_name ORDER BY ep.building_name, ep.unit_name
select count(1) from sys_property_meeting where (meeting_status = '1' or (vote_start_time <= sysdate() and vote_end_time >= sysdate()))

SELECT AVG(rates.participation_rate) FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN total_voters > 0 THEN (actual_voters * 1.0 / total_voters) * 100 ELSE 0 END as participation_rate FROM ( SELECT m.meeting_id, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT eup.user_id) FROM sys_estate_user_property eup WHERE eup.community_id = m.community_id AND eup.status = '1' AND (eup.del_flag = '0' OR eup.del_flag IS NULL)) as total_voters, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT mv.user_id) FROM sys_meeting_vote mv WHERE mv.meeting_id = m.meeting_id AND mv.vote_option IS NOT NULL) as actual_voters FROM sys_property_meeting m WHERE m.meeting_status = '2' ) t ) rates

select date_format(vote_end_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as `date`, count(1) as `count` from sys_property_meeting where vote_end_time >= date_sub(curdate(), interval 7 day) group by date_format(vote_end_time, '%Y-%m-%d') order by `date`

select date_format(meeting_time, '%Y-%m') as `month`, count(1) as `count` from sys_property_meeting where meeting_time >= date_sub(curdate(), interval 3 month) group by date_format(meeting_time, '%Y-%m') order by `month`
select meeting_title as `title`, date_format(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as `time`, 'vote' as `type` from sys_property_meeting order by create_time desc limit #{limit}
select count(1) from sys_property_meeting where meeting_time > sysdate()
